# All Locations from Mirrors

## Action Locations

## Why These Places?

This type of novel taking place in places where many of you move around on a daily basis may seem like a strange idea. But that's exactly how it was supposed to be.

The point was to show that the topics raised in it concern us already now and here. So as to prepare for the future.

Who has read it knows what it's about. Who hasn't read it, I invite you to [narratia.pl](http://narratia.pl)
